title: [Large-Scale] Attitudinal Competency Strengthening Program Through Activity-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Learners explore scientific solutions to everyday societal problems, engage in collaborative activities using personal devices, and receive continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can express positive affective attitudes toward scientific approaches for solving environmental issues.
Learners can establish and implement action plans that induce scientific behavioral change.
Learners can demonstrate social learning competencies during collaboration to accomplish collective problem-solving.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
